description: Gemini TOON Review - Recommendations #2 & #3 Complete! Updated all 6 MCP tools with TOON format documentation: fast_search, fast_refs, fast_goto, get_symbols, trace_call_path, and fast_explore. Each tool description now explains: (1) TOON is a compact tabular representation, (2) Achieves 35-70% token savings vs JSON (trace_call_path: 43% for call trees), (3) Auto mode intelligently selects TOON for 5+ results, (4) Example format: results[N]{field1,field2,...}: value1,value2,.... Addressed Gemini's concern about schema documentation - LLMs can now understand TOON format directly from tool descriptions without needing separate documentation. All code compiles cleanly. Combined with Recommendation #1 (data drift prevention) and #2 (POC documentation), Julie's TOON implementation is now fully documented and production-ready.
